Text.Text: Don't kill me!  I've done nothing wrong!  I've got diplomatic immunity!  I offer NO resistance!  None!  It was Venomin!
He's the yuan-ti pureblood inquisitor that just disintegrated himself in the magma sea - though I'd have pushed him in given half the chance!  *He* started this mess!
Venomin arrived three days ago, sent by High Priest Thorasskus to conduct an investigation into the disappearance of High Sorceress Izbelah.
Then yesterday, out of nowhere, the IDIOT killed Lord Pyros for who knows what reason - then had the audacity to seek sanctuary at *my* embassy!

To the east... Well met, I'm Ambassador Jasper - liaison between the residents in this magma chamber of the volcano and the yuan-ti above.   Sadly, due to Venomin, life here has slid steadily into the Abyss.

What didn't?!  Enraged, King Lothar assumed control, declared war on the yuan-ti, destroyed *my* embassy, and if that wasn't enough, sent efreet assassins after Thorasskus.  Naturally the yuan-ti responded, and well... the results are evident.
She perished two days ago while trying to *escape* from Lothar's cage - or so the story goes.  King Lothar - he's the law of the land... well, was.
I couldn't say.  I was away on business and she was already imprisoned when I returned.  The smell of it all repulsed me, but Venomin was on the case so I awaited his results.
That'd be Master Zil-t'yor.  He arrived a day before I did, keeping a low profile.  Amidst the utter chaos that ensued he united those of us who survived... we've pledged our allegiance to him.
His sovereign often travels to and from the Fields of Slaughter - that seems to be where he originates.
Greetings - I'm Ambassador Jasper.  Welcome to the embassy.  I've not seen you here before.  How may I help you?
Yes, of course.  But no, you've not been here before.  I never forget a face - I can literally burn one's image into my mind.

Were you dreaming?  Clearly there's no war, no destruction, and both Venomin *and* Lord Pyros are as alive as you or I - in fact, I believe they've just about concluded their private meeting in the palace.
He's having a private meeting with Lord Pyros at the palace.
She died instantly last night while trying to *escape* from Lothar's cage - or so the story goes.  King Lothar - he's the law of the land.

Yes, two days ago he entered from the Fields of Slaughter and tried raising a ruckus - we sent him scurrying away with broken eyestalks dangling from his bloated body.  I'm sure we've seen the last of him... it.
Your concern is appreciated - but worry not.  Life has been peaceful here for thirty years, and Archon continues to generate steady revenue... I don't foresee trouble anytime soon.
Impressive!  You took the words right from my mouth!  How'd you do that?  Did you read my mind?
Greetings - I'm Ambassador Jasper.  Welcome to the embassy.  Please excuse the mess as I've just retuned and haven't had time to tidy up.  How may I help you?
From what I understand, High Priest Thorasskus sent him here yesterday to investigate why Izbelah hasn't returned.  I believe he's trying to prove her innocence.
She's locked in King Lothar's cage, apparently for breaking the law.  I've not heard the details, but Venomin is looking into the matter, so I'll await his results.

Yes, a day ago he entered from the Fields of Slaughter and tried raising a ruckus - we sent him scurrying away with broken eyestalks dangling from his bloated body.  I'm sure we've seen the last of him... it.
King Lothar placed Izbelah's equipment in there for safekeeping.  Only High Priest Thorasskus can unlock it, but he's only done so under dire circumstances.
YOU'VE DONE WHAT?!  Contact Thorasskus.  He'll know how to solve this.

This is bad - so very, very bad!  Our lord is forever dead, cursed with poison by that snake Venomin!  Calm... calm... breathe...  King Lothar has yearned to eliminate the yuan-ti AND regain his status - *now* his excuse is at hand!  Death will become us...
Calm down and tell us what's going on.  Start with Venomin.
We've been told he killed - your ruler we presume - Lord Pyros?  Why?
Where can we find this Zil-t'yor?
What did you say happened during the war with the yuan-ti?
Where did you say Venomin was?
Ever hear of a beholder named Zil-t'yor?
Ever hear of a beholder named Zil-t'yor?
But... we were just here... I think.  Isn't this the magma chamber of Dragon's Eye?
But what about the war between the yuan-ti and the elementals, caused when Inquisitor Venomin killed Lord Pyros?  In fact, everything was destroyed a moment ago, now all is as good as new.
Ever hear of a beholder named Zil-t'yor?
Ever hear of a beholder named Zil-t'yor?
Where did you say Venomin was?
Ever hear of a beholder named Zil-t'yor?
Where did you say Venomin was?
Where did you say Venomin was?
...away on business and she was already imprisoned when you returned.  The smell of it all repulsed you, but Venomin was on the case so you awaited his results.  Right?
Where did you say Venomin was?
Ever hear of a beholder named Zil-t'yor?
No, I've the overwhelming sensation that we've done this before.  Farewell.
Ever hear of a beholder named Zil-t'yor?
Ever hear of a beholder named Zil-t'yor?
Ever hear of a beholder named Zil-t'yor?
I wouldn't be so sure.  Farewell.
Where did you say Venomin was?
Ever hear of a beholder named Zil-t'yor?
Ever hear of a beholder named Zil-t'yor?
Ever hear of a beholder named Zil-t'yor?
I must take my leave.  Farewell.
